Key Match Events: England opener Alex Hales and skipper Jos Buttler smashed half-centuries against New Zealand
England won by 20 runs against New Zealand
Pre-Game Insights: England have a clear advantage with net run rate on their mind and a top-two finish in the group
Sri Lanka need two upset victories to make the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are favourites against Sri Lanka due to their deep batting and surfeit of all-rounders
Sri Lanka are simply looking to end their campaign on a winning note
Others: England are in a three-way tussle for a place in the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup with New Zealand and Australia
Australia and New Zealand finished their Super 12 campaigns yesterday
